schemaVersion.description: Version of the schema this story should conform to.

fromArticle.description: Title of the Wikipedia article from which the story builder was launched

frames.description: List of frames of the story. Min/max number of frames are configurable and validated in code.

image.description: The image on a story frame

filename.description: Name of the image file. Example: Cat_poster_1.jpg

text.description: The text on a story frame

value.description: The current text that should be displayed on a story frame

fromArticle.description: Information about the article the text was taken from

articleTitle.description: Title of the article where the text was taken from

originalText.description: Original text taken from the article
